price: Dan jika engkau mengeraskan ucapanmu, sungguh, Dia mengetahui rahasia dan yang lebih tersembunyi.510)
arabic: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى
footnotes: *510) Maksud ayat ini ialah tidak perlu mengeraskan suara dalam berdoa karena Allah mendengar doa walaupun diucapkan dengan suara rendah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tajhar bil-qawli fa-innahu yaʿlamu al-sira wa-akhfā
